message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I can't go as low as $120, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget at $135. Would you be willing to consider $125?
